languages.text: {n}Над толпой разносится ядовитый хохоток — знакомый голос скомороха. Пока шум и аплодисменты зевак, наблюдавших за игрищами, затапливают площадь, вы окидываете ее взглядом — и вновь не можете высмотреть наглеца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}И снова этот знакомый до боли голос — насмешливый, едкий, дерзкий. Несомненно, принадлежащий скомороху. Несомненно, скрывающемуся где-то здесь... Пока шум и аплодисменты затапливают площадь, вы осматриваете ее на предмет скоморошьего колпака. И вновь... ничего. Лишь армия плачущих и смеющихся масок.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You hear venomous laughter from among the crowd and recognise Bluff's voice. As the square drowns in the clamour and applause of gawkers who were spectating the game, you look around for the court fool but cannot spot him anywhere.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Над толпой разносится ядовитый хохоток — знакомый голос скомороха. Пока шум и аплодисменты зевак, наблюдавших за игрищами, затапливают площадь, вы окидываете ее взглядом — и вновь не можете высмотреть наглеца.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听到人群中传来了恶毒的笑声，认出了那是闹闹的声音。随即，无数观众的喧嚣与掌声淹没了整个广场。你四处寻找那个小丑的身影，但却找不到他。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear venomous laughter from among the crowd and recognise Bluff's voice. As the square drowns in the clamour and applause of gawkers who were spectating the game, you look around for the court fool but cannot spot him anywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到人群中传来了恶毒的笑声，认出了那是闹闹的声音。随即，无数观众的喧嚣与掌声淹没了整个广场。你四处寻找那个小丑的身影，但却找不到他。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oyes una risotada cargada de veneno entre la multitud y reconoces la voz de Farol. Mientras la plaza entera prorrumpe en vítores y aplausos de los curiosos que observaban el juego, miras en derredor buscando al bufón de la corte, pero no lo ves por ninguna parte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear venomous laughter from among the crowd and recognise Bluff's voice. As the square drowns in the clamour and applause of gawkers who were spectating the game, you look around for the court fool but cannot spot him anywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes una risotada cargada de veneno entre la multitud y reconoces la voz de Farol. Mientras la plaza entera prorrumpe en vítores y aplausos de los curiosos que observaban el juego, miras en derredor buscando al bufón de la corte, pero no lo ves por ninguna parte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığın arasından çirkin bir kahkaha geldiğini duyuyorsun. Kahkahayı atan, Kurusıkı'dan başkası değil. Meydan, seyircilerin korkunç gürültüsüne ve alkışlarına boğuluyor. Gözlerin saray soytarısını arıyor ama onu bir türlü göremiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear venomous laughter from among the crowd and recognise Bluff's voice. As the square drowns in the clamour and applause of gawkers who were spectating the game, you look around for the court fool but cannot spot him anywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalığın arasından çirkin bir kahkaha geldiğini duyuyorsun. Kahkahayı atan, Kurusıkı'dan başkası değil. Meydan, seyircilerin korkunç gürültüsüne ve alkışlarına boğuluyor. Gözlerin saray soytarısını arıyor ama onu bir türlü göremiyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆の中から悪意に満ちた笑い声が聞こえ、ブラフの声とわかる。 野次馬たちの民衆の声と賞賛でかき消され、宮廷道化師を探すがどこにも彼を見つけることができない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear venomous laughter from among the crowd and recognise Bluff's voice. As the square drowns in the clamour and applause of gawkers who were spectating the game, you look around for the court fool but cannot spot him anywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆の中から悪意に満ちた笑い声が聞こえ、ブラフの声とわかる。民衆の声と賞賛でかき消され、宮廷道化師を探すがどこにも彼を見つけることができない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}De la foule vous parvient un rire fielleux que vous reconnaissez sans peine comme celui de Bluff, mais vous avez beau chercher, vous n'apercevez le bouffon nulle part. Très vite, la place est noyée dans les clameurs et les applaudissements des spectateurs venus assister au jeu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear venomous laughter from among the crowd and recognise Bluff's voice. As the square drowns in the clamour and applause of gawkers who were spectating the game, you look around for the court fool but cannot spot him anywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De la foule vous parvient un rire fielleux que vous reconnaissez sans peine comme celui de Bluff, mais vous avez beau chercher, vous n'apercevez le bouffon nulle part. Très vite, la place est noyée dans les clameurs et les applaudissements des spectateurs venus assister au jeu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hörst ein böses Lachen in der Menge und erkennst Bluffs Stimme. Während der Platz im Getöse und Applaus der Gaffer ertrinkt, die sich das Spiel angesehen haben, blickst du dich nach dem Hofnarren um, kannst ihn aber nicht entdecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear venomous laughter from among the crowd and recognise Bluff's voice. As the square drowns in the clamour and applause of gawkers who were spectating the game, you look around for the court fool but cannot spot him anywhere.{/n}
